Reviews.Title: “Lucky escape”
Reviews.Author: cathmac59
Reviews.Content: booked hotel thru usual hotel booking site reviews looked ok familiar location id arrived 9pm night admittedly didnt look reception shabby dingy ok im seasoned traveller deal suddenly found couldnt shown proper reception mean sharing thin wall reception desk bloke night extremely dingy bathroom joke shower looked clean repair tiles huge shower caddy shower floor shouldnt wash hand basin taps hanging bed basic sheet stupid looking fleece throw hello whats reception thin hear bloke moving stuff night moving boxes floor 340 am didnt feel comfortable safe single traveller day 730 am manager eventually 10am offered 3rd floor late couldnt wait fight refund remaining 3 nights reason hotel money upfront plus suspicious credit card charge booking site didnt highlight lucky escape wouldnt recommend hotel im picky traveller stay price staying cities world own worst experience ive

Reviews.Title: “Value for money budget hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Amanda G
Reviews.Content: friend returned 2 night break hotel lovely hotel clean arrived hotel welcomed friendly receptionist reception checkin easy offered nice gesture excellent location near lots restaurants shops bright cheerful bother staff definately return hotel

Reviews.Title: “Lovely stay, will book this hotel again &will recommend it as well”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel night london hubbies favourite band royal albert hall perfect location round corner earls court tube station lovely clean hotel cup tea cleangood flat screen tv wall microwavefridge hair dryer resonable price overall lovely stay book hotel recommend
